name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in cloud infrastructure, CI/CD, and scalable systems management. Expert in deploying containerized applications using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, while managing infrastructure as code with **Terraform**. Proficient in CI/CD pipeline automation using **Jenkins**, alongside strong experience in scripting with **Bash** for enhanced workflow efficiency.
Skilled in monitoring and observability tools including **Grafana** and **Google Cloud Monitoring**, ensuring high availability and performance of applications in cloud environments, particularly on **GCP**. Strong background in security practices and incident management, with a focus on error budgets and cost management strategies.
Versatile developer with solid expertise in **Python**, having delivered high-performance applications across healthcare and financial industries. Hands-on experience in both frontend and backend development technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Familiar with compliance-driven development aligned with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, as well as in building AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and real-time processing.

Produced detailed documentation and reports on system performance, security compliance, and incident outcomes to facilitate continuous learning and improvement.

Implemented robust CI/CD pipelines with **Jenkins** and **Terraform** to enhance deployment efficiency across **Docker** containers and **Kubernetes** clusters, improving release times by **30%**.

Collaborated in agile teams to streamline operations, utilizing **Bash** scripts for automation tasks that increased productivity and operational efficiency by **20%**.
Deployed scalable cloud solutions on **GCP**, optimizing resource utilization and cost management, achieving a **10%** reduction in overall cloud expenses.
